title: Asynchronous
description: The Asynchronous in JS allows tasks to run independently of the main program flow, enabling other code to execute while waiting for operations like data retrieval or network requests to complete.
content: The programming concept where tasks run independently from the main program flow. This allows the program to continue executing other code while waiting for tasks like data retrieval or file operations to complete.
